item.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Performance Tuning Guide
item.description: 1 TOOLS 1.1 top 1.2 ps 1.3 vmstat – Virtual Memory Statistics 1.4 sar – System Activity Repoter 1.5 perf 1.6 tubostat 1.7 iostat 1.8 irqbalance 1.9 ss – socket statistics 1.10 numastat 1.11 numad 本文为摘录，原文为： ../pdf/c/red_hat_enterprise_linux-7-performance_tuning_guide-en-us.pdf 1 TOOLS 链接到标题 1.1 top 链接到标题 1.2 ps 链接到标题 1.3 vmstat –
